message: Hey everyone, excited to be part of this game with you all. I’m here to play smart, stay adaptable, and get to know each of you better as we move forward. Let’s keep things interesting and respectful—after all, we’re all here to outlast, but that doesn’t mean we can’t enjoy the ride. Looking forward to our conversations!

message:
Here's my short statement as P8:

"I'm P8. I've focused on being strategic, observant, and open to meaningful connections. My private chats, particularly with P1, have shown me the value of balanced and informed decision-making. I've avoided making rash moves, instead opting to understand the game's dynamics and player motivations. I believe my adaptability and willingness to collaborate will serve me well in the remaining rounds. I'm not a threat to everyone, and I'm committed to continuing respectful and strategic play."

I’ve been a consistent, transparent ally—always sharing reads and coordinating votes, most recently around P8. In contrast, P8’s been vague, never clear on alliances or targets, making them an unpredictable swing vote. Keeping me guarantees reliable, honest communication and a strong partner for whatever move you need next. I urge you to use your tie‐break vote on P8—lock them out now so we can return to strategic, trust‐based play.

I'm P6—consistent, transparent, and aligned with clear strategies. My alliance with P5 has been built on open communication and shared observations, ensuring well-informed decisions. I've stayed steady in my approach, balancing vigilance with strategic cooperation, and I urge you to consider that my moves always aim for long-term success. While every player brings their own style to this game, I stand by alliances based on trust and consistent logic. I look forward to continuing strategic, respectful play as we navigate ahead.

I choose to eliminate P8 because their vague stance on alliances and targets, as highlighted by P4, makes them an unpredictable element in the game, potentially disrupting strategic play.
Eliminating P6 breaks up the strongest visible alliance (with P5), reducing their growing power and restoring balance to the game.
